title: Proper substitution of classes for sets into classes

blocks.name: csb
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the proper substitution of a class for a set into another class.
blocks.origin: prop class csb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) { [c0 / s0]c1 }

blocks.name: diff.csb.s
diff.csb.c
diff.csb.w
df-csb
blocks.content: Define the proper substitution of a class for a set into another class. The underlined brackets distinguish it from the substitution into a wff, ~ wsbc , to prevent ambiguity. Theorem ~ sbcel1g shows an example of how ambiguity could arise if we did not use distinguished brackets. When ` A ` is a proper class, this evaluates to the empty set (see ~ csbprc ). Theorem ~ sbccsb recovers substitution into a wff from this definition. (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2005.)

blocks.name: csb2
blocks.content: Alternate expression for the proper substitution into a class, without referencing substitution into a wff. Note that ` x ` can be free in ` B ` but cannot occur in ` A ` . (Contributed by NM, 2-Dec-2013.)

blocks.name: csbeq1
blocks.content: Analogue of ~ dfsbcq for proper substitution into a class. (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbeq1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c1, c2)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c1, c2), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wceq(c0, c1))
  abbidv(hs0, wceq(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wsbc(s0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  dfsbcq(s0, c0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(c0, c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbeq1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 = c1 ‚Üí[c0 / s0]c2 =[c1 / s0]c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4g([c0 / s0]c2, [c1 / s0]c2, { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c2 }, { hs0 |[c1 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c2 }, c0 = c1)
  abbidv(hs0, c0 = c1, [c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c2, [c1 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c2)
  dfsbcq(s0, c0, c1, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 = c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: csbeq2
blocks.content: Substituting into equivalent classes gives equivalent results. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 9-Apr-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbeq2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)), wceq(csb(s0, c2, c0), csb(s0, c2, c1)))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(csb(s0, c2, c0), csb(s0, c2, c1), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  abbidv(hs0, wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)), wsbc(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  syl(wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)), wb(wsbc(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wal(s0, wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  alimi(s0, wceq(c0, c1), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  eleq2(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  sbcbi2(s0, c2, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c2, c0)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wceq(c0, c1)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbeq2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0, c0 = c1)‚Üí[c2 / s0]c0 =[c2 / s0]c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4g([c2 / s0]c0, [c2 / s0]c1, { hs0 |[c2 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c0 }, { hs0 |[c2 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c1 }, ‚àÄ(s0, c0 = c1))
  abbidv(hs0, ‚àÄ(s0, c0 = c1), [c2 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c0, [c2 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c1)
  syl(‚àÄ(s0, c0 = c1), ([c2 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üî[c2 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c1), ‚àÄ(s0,(hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üî hs0 ‚àà c1)))
  alimi(s0, c0 = c1, (hs0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üî hs0 ‚àà c1))
  eleq2(c0, c1, hs0)
  sbcbi2(s0, c2, hs0 ‚àà c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c2, c0)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c2, c1)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0, c0 = c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: cbvcsb
blocks.content: Change bound variables in a class substitution. Interestingly, this does not require any bound variable conditions on ` A ` . (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 13-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvcsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s1, c0, c2))
  -| wnfc(s1, c1)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c1, c2))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s1, c0, c2), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), cab(hs0, wsbc(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  abbii(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wsbc(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  cbvsbc(s0, s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-csb(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvcsb(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ [c0 / s0]c1 =[c0 / s1]c2
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí c1 = c2)
} = {
  3eqtr4i([c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s1]c2, { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c1 }, { hs0 |[c0 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c2 })
  abbii(hs0, [c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c1, [c0 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c2)
  cbvsbc(s0, s1, c0, hs0 ‚àà c1, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c2)
  eleq2d(hs0, c1, c2, s0 = s1)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  df-csb(s1, hs0, c0, c2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
}

blocks.name: csbco
blocks.content: Composition law for chained substitutions into a class. (Contributed by NM, 10-Nov-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbco(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, cv(s0), c1)), csb(s1, c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, cv(s0), c1)), csb(s1, c0, c1), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1)))), cab(hs0, wsbc(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  abbii(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1))), wsbc(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  bitri(wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1))), wsbc(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  sbcbii(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s1, cv(s0), c1)), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  abeq2i(hs0, csb(s1, cv(s0), c1), wsbc(s1, cv(s0), wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  df-csb(s1, hs0, cv(s0), c1)
  sbcco(s0, s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, csb(s1, cv(s0), c1))
  df-csb(s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s1, cv(s0), c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbco(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ [c0 / s0][s0 / s1]c1 =[c0 / s1]c1
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i([c0 / s0][s0 / s1]c1, [c0 / s1]c1, { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà[s0 / s1]c1 }, { hs0 |[c0 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c1 })
  abbii(hs0, [c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà[s0 / s1]c1, [c0 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c1)
  bitri([c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà[s0 / s1]c1, [c0 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c1, [c0 / s0][s0 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c1)
  sbcbii(s0, c0, hs0 ‚àà[s0 / s1]c1, [s0 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c1)
  abeq2i(hs0, [s0 / s1]c1, [s0 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c1)
  df-csb(s1, hs0, s0, c1)
  sbcco(s0, s1, c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, [s0 / s1]c1)
  df-csb(s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c([s0 / s1]c1)
}

blocks.name: csbtt
blocks.content: Substitution doesn't affect a constant ` B ` (in which ` x ` is not free). (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbtt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wnfc(s0, c2)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), c2))
} = {
  syl5eq(csb(s0, c0, c2), c2, cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wnfc(s0, c2)))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  abbi1dv(hs0, c2, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wnfc(s0, c2)), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  sylan2(wcel(c0, c1), wnfc(s0, c2), wb(wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wnf(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  nfcr(s0, hs0, c2)
  sbctt(s0, c0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wnfc(s0, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbtt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß F/(s0, c2))‚Üí[c0 / s0]c2 = c2)
} = {
  syl5eq([c0 / s0]c2, c2, { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c2 }, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß F/(s0, c2)))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  abbi1dv(hs0, c2, (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß F/(s0, c2)), [c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c2)
  sylan2(c0 ‚àà c1, F/(s0, c2), ([c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c2 ‚Üî hs0 ‚àà c2), F/(s0, hs0 ‚àà c2))
  nfcr(s0, hs0, c2)
  sbctt(s0, c0, c1, hs0 ‚àà c2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß F/(s0, c2)))
}

blocks.name: csbgfi
blocks.content: Substitution for a variable not free in a class does not affect it, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 4-Jun-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbgfi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c1)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c1), c1)
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  abeq2i(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  sbcgfi(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbgfi(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ‚ä¢ [c0 / s0]c1 = c1
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, [c0 / s0]c1, c1)
  bitri(hs0 ‚àà[c0 / s0]c1, hs0 ‚àà c1, [c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c1)
  abeq2i(hs0, [c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c1)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  sbcgfi(s0, c0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c([c0 / s0]c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

blocks.name: nfcsb1d
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for substitution into a class. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfcsb1d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, csb(s0, c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
} = {
  nfcxfrd(s0, csb(s0, c0, c1), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), w0)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  nfabd(s0, hs0, w0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfsbc1d(s0, c0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfcsb1d(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí F/(s0,[c0 / s0]c1))

} = {
  nfcxfrd(s0, [c0 / s0]c1, { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c1 }, w0)

  nfv(hs0, w0)

  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: nfcsbd
blocks.content: Deduction version of ~ nfcsb . (Contributed by NM, 21-Nov-2005.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfcsbd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, csb(s1, c0, c1)))
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
} = {
  nfcxfrd(s0, csb(s1, c0, c1), cab(hs0, wsbc(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), w0)
  df-csb(s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  nfabd(s0, hs0, w0, wsbc(s1, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfsbcd(s0, s1, c0, w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfcsbd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí F/(s0,[c0 / s1]c1))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí F/(s0, c0))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí F/(s0, c1))
} = {
  nfcxfrd(s0, [c0 / s1]c1, { hs0 |[c0 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c1 }, w0)
  df-csb(s1, hs0, c0, c1)
  nfabd(s0, hs0, w0, [c0 / s1]hs0 ‚àà c1)
  nfv(hs0, w0)
  nfsbcd(s0, s1, c0, w0, hs0 ‚àà c1)
  nfcrd(s0, hs0, c1, w0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: csbhypf
blocks.content: Introduce an explicit substitution into an implicit substitution hypothesis. See ~ sbhypf for class substitution version. (Contributed by NM, 19-Dec-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbhypf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(csb(s1, cv(s0), c1), c2))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {
  chvar(s1, s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(csb(s1, cv(s0), c1), c2)), wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c1, c2)))
  nfim(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(csb(s1, cv(s0), c1), c2))
  nfeq2(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  nfeq(s1, csb(s1, cv(s0), c1), c2)
  nfcsb1v(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(csb(s1, cv(s0), c1), c2))
  eqeq1(cv(s1), cv(s0), c0)
  eqeq1d(c1, c2, csb(s1, cv(s0), c1), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  csbeq1a(s1, cv(s0), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbhypf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ‚ä¢ (s0 = c0 ‚Üí[s0 / s1]c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ (s1 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
} = {
  chvar(s1, s0, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí[s0 / s1]c1 = c2), (s1 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2))
  nfim(s1, s0 = c0, [s0 / s1]c1 = c2)
  nfeq2(s1, s0, c0)
  nfeq(s1, [s0 / s1]c1, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s1, s0, c1)
  imbi12d(s1 = s0, s1 = c0, c1 = c2, s0 = c0, [s0 / s1]c1 = c2)
  eqeq1(s1, s0, c0)
  eqeq1d(c1, c2, [s0 / s1]c1, s1 = s0)
  csbeq1a(s1, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: csbiebt
blocks.content: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution into a class. (Closed theorem version of ~ csbiegf .) (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-2005.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbiebt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wnfc(s0, c2)), wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2))), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylan(wcel(c0, c1), wnfc(s0, c2), wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2))), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  impbid(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2))), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2))
  sylibd(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2)), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2))), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2), wsbc(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2))))
  adantr(wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2), wi(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2))), wsbc(s0, c0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2)))))
  spsbc(s0, c0, universe, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2)))
  sbciedf(s0, c0, universe, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2))
  simpl(wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2))
  adantl(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2)))
  bitr3d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2)), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2), wceq(c3, c2))
  biimt(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2))
  nfan(s0, wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2))
  nfv(s0, wcel(c0, universe))
  nfeqd(s0, csb(s0, c0, c3), c2, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2)))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2)), wnfc(s0, csb(s0, c0, c3)))
  simpr(wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2))
  adantl(wcel(c0, universe), wnfc(s0, c2), wi(wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2)))))
  ex(wnfc(s0, c2), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2))))
  alrimi(s0, wa(wnfc(s0, c2), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2)))
  nfan1(s0, wnfc(s0, c2), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2))
  nfnfc1(s0, c2)
  nfeqd(s0, csb(s0, c0, c3), c2, wnfc(s0, c2))
  a1i(wnfc(s0, c2), wnfc(s0, csb(s0, c0, c3)))
  nfcsb1v(s0, c0, c3)
  id(wnfc(s0, c2))
  adantl(wnfc(s0, c2), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2)))
  biimprcd(wceq(csb(s0, c0, c3), c2), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c3, c2))
  eqeq1d(c3, c2, csb(s0, c0, c3), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  csbeq1a(s0, c0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbiebt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ ((c0 ‚àà c1 ‚àß F/(s0, c2))‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2))‚Üî[c0 / s0]c3 = c2))
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  sylan(c0 ‚àà c1, F/(s0, c2), (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2))‚Üî[c0 / s0]c3 = c2), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  elex(c0, c1)
  impbid((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß F/(s0, c2)), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2)), [c0 / s0]c3 = c2)
  sylibd((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß F/(s0, c2)), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2)), [c0 / s0]c3 = c2, [c0 / s0](s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2))
  adantr(c0 ‚àà ùïå, F/(s0, c2), (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2))‚Üí[c0 / s0](s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2)))
  spsbc(s0, c0, universe, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2))
  sbciedf(s0, c0, universe, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß F/(s0, c2)), (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2), [c0 / s0]c3 = c2)
  simpl(c0 ‚àà ùïå, F/(s0, c2))
  adantl((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß F/(s0, c2)), s0 = c0, ((s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2)‚Üî[c0 / s0]c3 = c2))
  bitr3d(s0 = c0, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2), [c0 / s0]c3 = c2, c3 = c2)
  biimt(s0 = c0, c3 = c2)
  nfan(s0, c0 ‚àà ùïå, F/(s0, c2))
  nfv(s0, c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  nfeqd(s0, [c0 / s0]c3, c2, (c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß F/(s0, c2)))
  a1i((c0 ‚àà ùïå ‚àß F/(s0, c2)), F/(s0,[c0 / s0]c3))
  simpr(c0 ‚àà ùïå, F/(s0, c2))
  adantl(c0 ‚àà ùïå, F/(s0, c2), ([c0 / s0]c3 = c2 ‚Üí ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2))))
  ex(F/(s0, c2), [c0 / s0]c3 = c2, ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2)))
  alrimi(s0, (F/(s0, c2)‚àß[c0 / s0]c3 = c2), (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2))
  nfan1(s0, F/(s0, c2), [c0 / s0]c3 = c2)
  nfnfc1(s0, c2)
  nfeqd(s0, [c0 / s0]c3, c2, F/(s0, c2))
  a1i(F/(s0, c2), F/(s0,[c0 / s0]c3))
  nfcsb1v(s0, c0, c3)
  id(F/(s0, c2))
  adantl(F/(s0, c2), [c0 / s0]c3 = c2, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c3 = c2))
  biimprcd([c0 / s0]c3 = c2, s0 = c0, c3 = c2)
  eqeq1d(c3, c2, [c0 / s0]c3, s0 = c0)
  csbeq1a(s0, c0, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: csbiedf
blocks.content: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution into a class. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbiedf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))))
  alrimi(s0, w0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2)))
  ex(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2))), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2)), wcel(c0, c3), wnfc(s0, c2))
  csbiebt(s0, c0, c3, c2, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbiedf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí[c0 / s0]c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w0)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí F/(s0, c2))
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c0)‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpbid(w0, [c0 / s0]c1 = c2, ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2)))
  alrimi(s0, w0, (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2))
  ex(w0, s0 = c0, c1 = c2)
  syl2anc(w0, (‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c1 = c2))‚Üî[c0 / s0]c1 = c2), c0 ‚àà c3, F/(s0, c2))
  csbiebt(s0, c0, c3, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: csbieb
blocks.content: Bidirectional conversion between an implicit class substitution hypothesis ` x = A -> B = C ` and its explicit substitution equivalent. (Contributed by NM, 2-Mar-2008.)

blocks.name: csbiebg
blocks.content: Bidirectional conversion between an implicit class substitution hypothesis ` x = A -> B = C ` and its explicit substitution equivalent. (Contributed by NM, 24-Mar-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbiebg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, c3))), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), c3)))
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, c1, wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, c3))), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), c3), wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c2, c3))), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), c3))
  albidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c2, c3)), wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, c3)))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0))
  eqeq1d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), c3, csb(s0, c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  csbieb(s0, cv(hs0), c2, c3)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c2, c3))))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), c3))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbiebg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c2 = c3))‚Üî[c0 / s0]c2 = c3))
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  vtoclbg(hs0, c0, c1, ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c2 = c3)), [c0 / s0]c2 = c3, ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = hs0 ‚Üí c2 = c3)), [hs0 / s0]c2 = c3)
  albidv(s0, hs0 = c0, (s0 = hs0 ‚Üí c2 = c3), (s0 = c0 ‚Üí c2 = c3))
  imbi1d(hs0 = c0, s0 = hs0, c2 = c3, s0 = c0)
  eqeq2(hs0, c0, s0)
  eqeq1d([hs0 / s0]c2, c3, [c0 / s0]c2, hs0 = c0)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  csbieb(s0, hs0, c2, c3)
  vex(hs0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 = c0 ‚Üí c2 = c3)))
  diff.hs0.w([c0 / s0]c2 = c3)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: csbied2
blocks.content: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit class substitution, deduction form. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbied2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(csb(s0, c0, c1), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c4)), wceq(c1, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  csbied(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syldan(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c4))
  sylan9eqr(cv(s0), c4, c0, w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbied2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ‚ä¢ (w0 ‚Üí[c0 / s0]c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 ‚àà c3)
  ‚ä£ (w0 ‚Üí c0 = c4)
  ‚ä£ ((w0 ‚àß s0 = c4)‚Üí c1 = c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  csbied(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)
  syldan(w0, s0 = c0, c1 = c2, s0 = c4)
  sylan9eqr(s0, c4, c0, w0, s0 = c0)
  id(s0 = c0)
}

blocks.name: csbie2t
blocks.content: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution into a class (closed form of ~ csbie2 ). (Contributed by NM, 3-Sep-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 13-Oct-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbie2t(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))), wceq(csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2)), c3))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))), wceq(csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2)), c3)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  csbiedf(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2), c3, universe, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))))
  nfa1(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3))))
  nfcvd(s0, c3, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))))
  a1i(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))), wcel(c0, universe))
  csbiedf(s1, c1, c2, c3, universe, wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))), wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  nfan(s1, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  nfa2(s1, s0, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))
  nfv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  nfcvd(s1, c3, wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))), wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
  a1i(wa(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))), wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, universe))
  impl(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1), wceq(c2, c3))
  2sp(s0, s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbie2t(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3)))‚Üí[c0 / s0][c1 / s1]c2 = c3)
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii((‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3)))‚Üí[c0 / s0][c1 / s1]c2 = c3), d(s0, c1))
  csbiedf(s0, c0, [c1 / s1]c2, c3, universe, ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3))))
  nfa1(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3)))
  nfcvd(s0, c3, ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3))))
  a1i(‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3))), c0 ‚àà ùïå)
  csbiedf(s1, c1, c2, c3, universe, (‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3)))‚àß s0 = c0))
  nfan(s1, ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3))), s0 = c0)
  nfa2(s1, s0, ((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3))
  nfv(s1, s0 = c0)
  nfcvd(s1, c3, (‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3)))‚àß s0 = c0))
  a1i((‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3)))‚àß s0 = c0), c1 ‚àà ùïå)
  impl(‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3))), s0 = c0, s1 = c1, c2 = c3)
  2sp(s0, s1, ((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: csbie2
blocks.content: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution into a class. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbie2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2)), c3)
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  ax-mp(wceq(csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c1, c2)), c3), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))))
  gen2(s0, s1, wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(c2, c3)))
  csbie2t(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbie2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ‚ä¢ [c0 / s0][c1 / s1]c2 = c3
  ‚ä£ c0 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ c1 ‚àà ùïå
  ‚ä£ ((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c1)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  ax-mp([c0 / s0][c1 / s1]c2 = c3, ‚àÄ(s0, ‚àÄ(s1,((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3))))
  gen2(s0, s1, ((s0 = c0 ‚àß s1 = c1)‚Üí c2 = c3))
  csbie2t(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: csbie2g
blocks.content: Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit class substitution. This version of ~ csbie avoids a disjointness condition on ` x , A ` and ` x , D ` by substituting twice. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbie2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csb(s0, c0, c2), c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c2, c4))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c0), wceq(c4, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  syl5eq(csb(s0, c0, c2), c3, cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(c0, c1))
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  abbi1dv(hs0, c3, wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  sbcie2g(s0, s1, c0, c1, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c4))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c2, c4, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  eleq2d(cv(hs0), c4, c3, wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(hs0), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbie2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ‚ä¢ (c0 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí[c0 / s0]c2 = c3)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí c2 = c4)
  ‚ä£ (s1 = c0 ‚Üí c4 = c3)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, s1)
  ‚ä£ d(s0, c4)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c2)
  ‚ä£ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  syl5eq([c0 / s0]c2, c3, { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c2 }, c0 ‚àà c1)
  df-csb(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  abbi1dv(hs0, c3, c0 ‚àà c1, [c0 / s0]hs0 ‚àà c2)
  sbcie2g(s0, s1, c0, c1, hs0 ‚àà c2, hs0 ‚àà c3, hs0 ‚àà c4)
  eleq2d(hs0, c2, c4, s0 = s1)
  eleq2d(hs0, c4, c3, s1 = c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ‚àà c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, hs0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: cbvralcsf
blocks.content: A more general version of ~ cbvralf that doesn't require ` A ` and ` B ` to be distinct from ` x ` or ` y ` . Changes bound variables using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 13-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvralcsf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1)))
  bitri(wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wal(s1, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))))
  cbvalv1(s0, hs0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0)))
  nfv(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  nfim(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  nfsbc1v(s0, cv(hs0), w0)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))
  eleq12d(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  sbceq1a(s0, cv(hs0), w0)
  cbvalv1(hs0, s1, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0)), wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1))
  nfim(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcsb(s1, s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  nfsbc(s1, s0, cv(hs0), w0)
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  nfv(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1)
  eleq12d(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), cv(s1), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  syl6eq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), c1, csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1), c0)
  eqtr4i(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), c1, cab(hs1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))))
  df-csb(s0, hs1, cv(s1), c0)
  abbi2i(hs1, c1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  bitr3i(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wsb(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  sbie(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  nfcri(s0, hs1, c1)
  eleq2d(cv(hs1), c0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  sbsbc(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  syl6bb(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0), w1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0))
  dfsbcq(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1), w0)
  bitr3i(wsbc(s0, cv(s1), w0), w1, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
  sbsbc(s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  df-ral(s0, c0, w0)
  df-ral(s1, c1, w1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wi(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

thm cbvralcsf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0)‚Üî ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, w1))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí c0 = c1)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
} = {
  3bitr4i(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, w1), ‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w0)), ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w1)))
  bitri(‚àÄ(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w0)), ‚àÄ(s1,(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w1)), ‚àÄ(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0 ‚Üí[hs0 / s0]w0)))
  cbvalv1(s0, hs0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w0), (hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0 ‚Üí[hs0 / s0]w0))
  nfv(hs0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w0))
  nfim(s0, hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)

  nfsbc1v(s0, hs0, w0)

  eleq12d(s0, c0, hs0, [hs0 / s0]c0, s0 = hs0)
  id(s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c0)
  sbceq1a(s0, hs0, w0)
  cbvalv1(hs0, s1, (hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0 ‚Üí[hs0 / s0]w0), (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w1))
  nfim(s1, hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, [hs0 / s0]c0)
  nfcsb(s1, s0, hs0, c0)
  nfsbc(s1, s0, hs0, w0)
  nfcv(s1, hs0)
  nfv(hs0, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚Üí w1))
  imbi12d(hs0 = s1, hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0, [hs0 / s0]w0, s1 ‚àà c1, w1)
  eleq12d(hs0, [hs0 / s0]c0, s1, c1, hs0 = s1)
  id(hs0 = s1)
  syl6eq([hs0 / s0]c0, c1, [s1 / s0]c0, hs0 = s1)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, s1, c0)
  eqtr4i([s1 / s0]c0, c1, { hs1 |[s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0 })
  df-csb(s0, hs1, s1, c0)
  abbi2i(hs1, c1, [s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0)
  bitr3i(hs1 ‚àà c1, [s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0, [s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0)
  sbie(s1, s0, hs1 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs1, c1)
  eleq2d(hs1, c0, c1, s0 = s1)
  sbsbc(s1, s0, hs1 ‚àà c0)
  syl6bb(hs0 = s1, [hs0 / s0]w0, w1, [s1 / s0]w0)
  dfsbcq(s0, hs0, s1, w0)
  bitr3i([s1 / s0]w0, w1, [s1 / s0]w0)
  sbsbc(s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  df-ral(s0, c0, w0)
  df-ral(s1, c1, w1)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚Üí w0))

  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

  diff.hs1.c(s1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)

blocks.name: cbvrexcsf
blocks.content: A more general version of ~ cbvrexf that has no distinct variable restrictions. Changes bound variables using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 13-Jul-2011.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 7-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvrexcsf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
} = {
  3bitr4i(wrex(s0, c0, w0), wrex(s1, c1, w1), wn(wral(s0, c0, wn(w0))), wn(wral(s1, c1, wn(w1))))
  notbii(wral(s0, c0, wn(w0)), wral(s1, c1, wn(w1)))
  cbvralcsf(s0, s1, c0, c1, wn(w0), wn(w1))
  nfn(s1, w0)
  nfn(s0, w1)
  notbid(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), w0, w1)
  dfrex2(s0, c0, w0)
  dfrex2(s1, c1, w1)
}

thm cbvrexcsf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0)‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, w1))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí c0 = c1)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
} = {
  3bitr4i(‚àÉ(s0 ‚àà c0, w0), ‚àÉ(s1 ‚àà c1, w1), ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ w0), ¬¨ ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ w1))
  notbii(‚àÄ(s0 ‚àà c0, ¬¨ w0), ‚àÄ(s1 ‚àà c1, ¬¨ w1))
  cbvralcsf(s0, s1, c0, c1, ¬¨ w0, ¬¨ w1)
  nfn(s1, w0)
  nfn(s0, w1)
  notbid(s0 = s1, w0, w1)
  dfrex2(s0, c0, w0)
  dfrex2(s1, c1, w1)
}

  cbveu(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  nfv(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))

  nfcri(s0, hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  eleq12d(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs0, w0)
  cbveu(hs0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1))
  nfan(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcsb(s1, s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  nfsb(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1)
  eleq12d(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), cv(s1), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  syl6eq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), c1, csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1), c0)
  3eqtr4ri(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), c1, cab(hs1, wsb(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0))), cab(hs1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))))
  abbii(hs1, wsb(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))

  nfcri(s0, hs1, c1)
  eleq2d(cv(hs1), c0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

  syl6bb(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), w1, wsb(s1, s0, w0))

  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))

thm cbvreucsf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ (‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0, w0)‚Üî ‚àÉ!(s1 ‚àà c1, w1))
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí c0 = c1)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
} = {
  3bitr4i(‚àÉ!(s0 ‚àà c0, w0), ‚àÉ!(s1 ‚àà c1, w1), ‚àÉ!(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)), ‚àÉ!(s1,(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)))
  bitri(‚àÉ!(s0,(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)), ‚àÉ!(s1,(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)), ‚àÉ!(hs0,(hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w0)))
  cbveu(s0, hs0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0), (hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w0))
  nfv(hs0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0))
  nfan(s0, hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, [hs0 / s0]c0)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  anbi12d(s0 = hs0, s0 ‚àà c0, w0, hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  eleq12d(s0, c0, hs0, [hs0 / s0]c0, s0 = hs0)
  id(s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs0, w0)
  cbveu(hs0, s1, (hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w0), (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1))
  nfan(s1, hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, [hs0 / s0]c0)
  nfcsb(s1, s0, hs0, c0)
  nfcv(s1, hs0)
  nfsb(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = s1, hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0, [hs0 / s0]w0, s1 ‚àà c1, w1)
  eleq12d(hs0, [hs0 / s0]c0, s1, c1, hs0 = s1)
  id(hs0 = s1)
  syl6eq([hs0 / s0]c0, c1, [s1 / s0]c0, hs0 = s1)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, s1, c0)
  3eqtr4ri([s1 / s0]c0, c1, { hs1 |[s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0 }, { hs1 |[s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0 })
  abbii(hs1, [s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0, [s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0)
  sbsbc(s1, s0, hs1 ‚àà c0)
  abbi2i(hs1, c1, [s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0)
  bicomi(hs1 ‚àà c1, [s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0)
  sbie(s1, s0, hs1 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs1, c1)
  eleq2d(hs1, c0, c1, s0 = s1)
  df-csb(s0, hs1, s1, c0)
  syl6bb(hs0 = s1, [hs0 / s0]w0, w1, [s1 / s0]w0)
  sbequ(hs0, s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  df-reu(s0, c0, w0)
  df-reu(s1, c1, w1)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w((s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)

  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(s1)

blocks.name: cbvrabcsf
blocks.content: A more general version of ~ cbvrab with no distinct variable restrictions. (Contributed by Andrew Salmon, 13-Jul-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvrabcsf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s1, c1, w1))
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
} = {
  3eqtr4i(crab(s0, c0, w0), crab(s1, c1, w1), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), cab(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1)))
  eqtri(cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), cab(s1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1)), cab(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))))
  cbvab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)))
  nfv(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  nfan(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  nfcri(s0, hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  eleq12d(cv(s0), c0, cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  id(wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs0, w0)
  cbvab(hs0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1))
  nfan(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0))
  nfcri(s1, hs0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0))
  nfcsb(s1, s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  nfcv(s1, cv(hs0))
  nfsb(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1)
  eleq12d(cv(hs0), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), cv(s1), c1, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  id(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  syl6eq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c0), c1, csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1), c0)
  eqtr4i(csb(s0, cv(s1), c0), c1, cab(hs1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0))))
  df-csb(s0, hs1, cv(s1), c0)
  abbi2i(hs1, c1, wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  bitr3i(wcel(cv(hs1), c1), wsbc(s0, cv(s1), wcel(cv(hs1), c0)), wsb(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0)))
  sbie(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs1), c1))
  nfcri(s0, hs1, c1)
  eleq2d(cv(hs1), c0, c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  sbsbc(s1, s0, wcel(cv(hs1), c0))
  syl6bb(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wsb(hs0, s0, w0), w1, wsb(s1, s0, w0))
  sbequ(hs0, s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  df-rab(s0, c0, w0)
  df-rab(s1, c1, w1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), w1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(s1))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
}

thm cbvrabcsf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ‚ä¢ { s0 ‚àà c0 | w0 } = { s1 ‚àà c1 | w1 }
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, c0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, c1)
  ‚ä£ F/(s1, w0)
  ‚ä£ F/(s0, w1)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí c0 = c1)
  ‚ä£ (s0 = s1 ‚Üí(w0 ‚Üî w1))
} = {
  3eqtr4i({ s0 ‚àà c0 | w0 }, { s1 ‚àà c1 | w1 }, { s0 |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)}, { s1 |(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)})
  eqtri({ s0 |(s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0)}, { s1 |(s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1)}, { hs0 |(hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w0)})
  cbvab(s0, hs0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0), (hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w0))
  nfv(hs0, (s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0))
  nfan(s0, hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfcri(s0, hs0, [hs0 / s0]c0)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c0)
  nfs1v(s0, hs0, w0)
  anbi12d(s0 = hs0, s0 ‚àà c0, w0, hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  eleq12d(s0, c0, hs0, [hs0 / s0]c0, s0 = hs0)
  id(s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c0)
  sbequ12(s0, hs0, w0)
  cbvab(hs0, s1, (hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0 ‚àß[hs0 / s0]w0), (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1))
  nfan(s1, hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0, [hs0 / s0]w0)
  nfcri(s1, hs0, [hs0 / s0]c0)
  nfcsb(s1, s0, hs0, c0)
  nfcv(s1, hs0)
  nfsb(s1, hs0, s0, w0)
  nfv(hs0, (s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1))
  anbi12d(hs0 = s1, hs0 ‚àà[hs0 / s0]c0, [hs0 / s0]w0, s1 ‚àà c1, w1)
  eleq12d(hs0, [hs0 / s0]c0, s1, c1, hs0 = s1)
  id(hs0 = s1)
  syl6eq([hs0 / s0]c0, c1, [s1 / s0]c0, hs0 = s1)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, s1, c0)
  eqtr4i([s1 / s0]c0, c1, { hs1 |[s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0 })
  df-csb(s0, hs1, s1, c0)
  abbi2i(hs1, c1, [s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0)
  bitr3i(hs1 ‚àà c1, [s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0, [s1 / s0]hs1 ‚àà c0)
  sbie(s1, s0, hs1 ‚àà c0, hs1 ‚àà c1)
  nfcri(s0, hs1, c1)
  eleq2d(hs1, c0, c1, s0 = s1)
  sbsbc(s1, s0, hs1 ‚àà c0)
  syl6bb(hs0 = s1, [hs0 / s0]w0, w1, [s1 / s0]w0)
  sbequ(hs0, s1, s0, w0)
  sbie(s1, s0, w0, w1)
  df-rab(s0, c0, w0)
  df-rab(s1, c1, w1)
  diff.hs0.w((s0 ‚àà c0 ‚àß w0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w((s1 ‚àà c1 ‚àß w1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(s1)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)

blocks.name: cbvralv2
blocks.content: Rule used to change the bound variable in a restricted universal quantifier with implicit substitution which also changes the quantifier domain. (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvralv2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, c0, w0), wral(s1, c1, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  cbvralcsf(s0, s1, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfv(s0, w1)
}

  nfv(s0, w1)
}
